content: संमन् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To agree, concur, be of the same opinion. {@--2@} To assent or consent to, approve of, like. {@--3@} To think, suppose, regard. {@--4@} To sanction, authorize. {@--5@} To esteem, honour, value highly; कच्चिदग्निमिवानाय्यं काले संप्रन्यसेऽतिथिं <ls>Bk. 6. 65</ls>; सममंस्त बंधूत् <ls n="Bk.">1. 2.</ls> {@--6@} To allow, permit. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To honour, respect, value highly. {@--2@} To consider, regard. {@--3@} To instruct, teach.
